riddle: Say my name and I am no more. What am I? (One word)
What instrument can you hear but never see?
What kind of fish chases a mouse? (One word)
If I am holding a bee, what do I have in my eye? (One word)
answer: Beauty (because bueaty is in the eye of the bee-holder)

riddle: What pulls you down and never lets go? (One word)
A rooster laid an egg on top of a barn, which way did it fall?
One day a man jumped from a plane without a parachute and suffered no injuries, how is that possible?
answer: The plane was on the ground
